item.title: A Scanner Darkly pitch
item.dc:creator: Brian Kirsten
item.content:encoded: Rustmonkey pitched this short preview to Steven Soderburgh and George Clooney's company Section 8, in response to the news that they were looking to develop Phillip K. Dick's novel A Scanner Darkly as a possible animated film.
item.excerpt:encoded: Rustmonkey pitched this short preview to Steven Soderburgh and George Clooney's company Section 8, in response to the news that they were looking to develop Phillip K. Dick's novel A Scanner Darkly as a possible animated film.
